path.name: Recording Save Folder
path.description: The folder where recordings are saved.

signature_header.name: Packet Signature Header
signature_header.description: Header to identify valid data packets. Empty to disable.

split_char.name: Packet Split Char
split_char.description: Chararcter that is used to separate values. Example: '123;321'

message_header.name: Message Signature Header
message_header.description: Header for MESSAGE packets, put after signature header. Empty to disable.
